page.title: 18SPARE TIME ACTIVITIES.
page.content: We had a discussion with our class to see what we did in our spare time.We found out that everybody watched T.V. Eastenders is the most popular series. The big thing with the boys is soccer. In our class we have quite a few of us who go swimming, riding, and skating. Everyone in our class has a bike. Most people have a racer or B.M.X. A lot of people like reading. Favourite authors are Enid Blyton and Roald Dahl. Half the boys go to Cubs but only two girls go to Brownies.Most nine and ten year olds go to Youth Club on Monday night. A lot of people have a computer which they play games on. Most of the class go to Gym Club on Monday after school. Quite a few people have electric train sets.Building Lego models is enjoyed by girls and boys.Technical Lego is used mostly by boys.A few people are starting to learn to play tennis.
